ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
RecordType.Name = "3D" &&
ISCHANGED(Stage__c) && ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Pending Payment") &&
( Close_Date__c - TODAY() < 0 || Close_Date__c - TODAY() > 14 )
&& !ISCHANGED(Manager_Notes__c) && NOT(isAmountUpdatedFromOpp__c)
&& !$Permission.Ignore_All_VR && !$Permission.Ignore_Opp_VR
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to put the Stage into Pending Payment, the Close Date must be within 14 days from today.
